ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Checkpoint recover problem
ygData.msgSnippet: You do need to keep the DEL files that correspond to checkpoints you want to recover. (The active crawl renames JDB files as DEL when it no longer needs

X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=-J1274TcJLjq3s58kZlFVw3qRcH82JdUq90pTtS0XZwZ

You do need to keep the 'DEL' files that correspond to checkpoints you 
want to recover. (The active crawl renames JDB files as DEL when it no 
longer needs them, but checkpoints may still need them.) So, that may be 
your problem.

(A future version may make checkpoint directories with hard links to all 
necessary files, so that necessary files cannot be easily deleted, and 
add better checkpoint-file-management to the web UI.)

Without a checkpoint, you could still use any 'frontier-recover' logs to 
*roughly* reproduce the crawl state as of a certain point in time. (Not 
all stats/reporting is reproduced, but the accounting of URIs 
already-fetched and needing-fetching is correct.) Note that in H3 you 
make a launch consult a recovery-log by placing a copy of it in the 
'action' directory, rather than specifying its path in an optional 
settings field.

- Gordon @ IA

On 1/26/11 6:30 AM, Mahmoud Mubarak wrote:
>
> I used to make a checkpoint for backing up the crawling in case of any
> crash. When I tried to launch Heritrix from the latest check point, this
> error arises:
>
> 2011-01-26T13:01:22.449Z SEVERE IllegalStateException:
> com.sleepycat.je.EnvironmentFailureException: (JE 4.0.71) Environment
> must be closed, caused by: com.sleepycat.je.EnvironmentFailureException:
> Environment invalid because of previous exception: (JE 4.0.71)
> /usr/local/heritrix-3.1.1-SNAPSHOT/./jobs/arab-league/state
> java.io.FileNotFoundException:
> /usr/local/heritrix-3.1.1-SNAPSHOT/./jobs/arab-league/state/000026b4.jdb
> (No such file or directory) LOG_FILE_NOT_FOUND: Log file missing, log is
> likely invalid. Environment is invalid and must be closed. (in thread
> 'arab-league launchthread')
>
> 2011-01-26T13:01:21.989Z SEVERE needed log files missing: [00002673.jdb,
> 0000266d.jdb, 0000257a.jdb, 000026a8.jdb, 00002684.jdb, 0000254d.jdb,
> 00002651.jdb, 00002683.jdb, 00002627.jdb, 00002574.jdb, 0000259c.jdb,
> 00002647.jdb, 00000d9a.jdb, 0000263c.jdb, 00002553.jdb, 000025f7.jdb,
> 0000260b.jdb, 000001cb.jdb, 000025ba.jdb] (in thread 'arab-league
> launchthread')
>
>
> I use a crontab to delete .del files only, does that make a porblem in
> the recovery?
>
>
